title: Pros & Connellys
description: HRTV’s most popular couple make their clients’ home renovation dreams come true.
quote: When you need the pros, call the Connellys.
altHero: Chazz and Tiffany Connelly cover the eyes of a couple about to reveal their backyard renovation
alt1: Tiffany shows their clients their new living room and light fixture
alt2: a fancy backyard with pool and basketball court
alt3: the Connellys speak to the camera while holding champagne flutes
alt4: the Connellys speak to the camera with Tiffany holding a paint roller
